a.n: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! I (20)

p.k:
Relay tales / The barbababies' world Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it.
The Barbapapa family spends a day at the beach. Divided into 2 teams, the barbababies fight over a sandy peninsula (2020).
